lead_paragraph: Former NFL quarterback and current ESPN broadcaster Tim Tebow is actively pursuing a career in professional baseball and plans to hold a workout for Major League Baseball teams later this month, according to his agents.

headline.print_headline: Baseball: Former NFL Quarterback Tebow Trying Hand at Baseball
headline.main: Baseball: Former NFL Quarterback Tebow Trying Hand at Baseball
